Harold E. Wood
Having just returned from meetings with Iowa
and South Dakota people who are willing and
anxious to start construction on a 6-state
network the moment some federal funds are
available, I want to urge you to do what you
can to get early passage of the Magnusson-
Roberts Bi41.
All six legislatures meet early in 1961
(and quit after 90 to 120 days) and our chances
of getting operating expenses appropriated at
these sessions are doubtful unless federal legis¬
lation can be passed before they adjourn.
Chris can give you details of our progress
(which is very great) when he calls but please
tell Marks, Schenkkan et al to get on the bal
(poetry).
6
